definition: to rescue/to help out of difficulties/to save the situation
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: 5 the central army, save dared stand up for the reds.
sentences.chinese: 五戰中央軍，解救紅軍張敢爲。

sentences.english: The solider delivered the boy from the flood.
sentences.chinese: 士兵把小男孩從洪水中解救了出來。

sentences.english: We redouble our efforts for Manhan's release.
sentences.chinese: 爲了解救馬漢，我們做了最大的努力。

sentences.english: Once Hancock was summoned to the aid of a whale that had washed up on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 有一回，漢考克被人召喚去解救一頭擱淺的鯨魚。

sentences.english: We need a Princess Charming - a woman who rescues her man and slays the dragon, instead of the other way round.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要一個魅力公主來解救她的人民，殺死巨龍。

sentences.english: Araya was the sixth from the 33 trapped miners to be lifted from underground.
sentences.chinese: 安瑞亞是被困的33名礦工中得到解救的第六個。

sentences.english: So, tried brother, cheer your heart with Samson's words, and rest assured that God will deliver you ere long.
sentences.chinese: 以參孫的話振作你心，堅信不久上帝必解救你。

sentences.english: So far, it has rescued more than 100 trafficked children.
sentences.chinese: 迄今爲止已經解救了100多名被拐兒童。

sentences.english: When Harlan goes to rescue Lisa, he finds her bound and gagged.
sentences.chinese: 哈倫發現莉莎被捆綁住並被東西塞住嘴，他解救了她。

sentences.english: The people on the streetcar and scattered passersby worked to free the woman.
sentences.chinese: 電車上的人和零散的路人奮力把那個女人解救出來。

sentences.english: Countries can only save themselves by pushing through reforms.
sentences.chinese: 相關國家只有通過推行改革，才能解救自己。

sentences.english: How will brave Ponda rescue Piga?
sentences.chinese: 英勇的胖達要如何解救皮嘎呢？

sentences.english: Final Zhang Quanzhong hostage of one rescue of Shi Erdiao success peddles poison catch the whole lot in an action.
sentences.chinese: 最後張全忠一石二鳥成功解救人質並將毒販一網打盡。

sentences.english: Putin said that saving the lives of the hostages is the main goal.
sentences.chinese: 普京說俄政府當前最主要的任務是解救人質。

sentences.english: He's never lost anyone who trusted Him to save them.
sentences.chinese: 他從未失去任何一個相信他能解救自己的人。

sentences.english: The story concerns the prince's efforts to rescue Pamina.
sentences.chinese: 這故事講的是王子奮力解救帕米娜。

definition: to come to the aid of/to save/to rescue from danger/to relieve
to escape (danger)/to rescue/to come out alive
to get away/to escape (from obligations)/to free oneself/to disengage
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down
